isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Inner Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

step1.para:
Remove front cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 61 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once the front cab door trim panel (Item 1) is removed. Before removing front cab door inner door panel water shield (Item 2), note how it is positioned on the front cab door (Item 3), so that it can be installed properly during the install procedure. Carefully remove the front cab door inner door panel water shield from the front cab door, driver side shown. Lay out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 61. Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. FRONT CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
9. BLUNT TIP FLAT BLADE SCREW DRIVER

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side front cab door inner door panel water shield.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Cab Door Inner Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

step1.para:
Remove rear cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once the rear cab door trim panel (Item 1) is removed. Before removing rear cab door inner door panel water shield (Item 2), note how it is positioned on the rear cab door (Item 3), so that it can be installed properly during the install procedure. Carefully remove the rear cab door inner door panel water shield from the rear cab door, driver side shown. Lay out of the way and save for installation unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 62. Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. REAR CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
9. BLUNT TIP FLAT BLADE SCREW DRIVER

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side rear cab door inner door panel water shield.
